    ABOUT

    I am working as a Graduate Reserach Assistant at Department of Computer Science of Boise State University. I am pursuing my PhD degree on the Computer Science emphasis under the supervision of Dr. Michael Ekstrand. I am an active member of the People and Information Research Team (PIReT) since Fall-2018.

    After completing my Bachelorâ€™s degree from Department of Computer Science and Engineering of University of Dhaka, I moved from Bangladesh to USA to start my journey of PhD.
